  <history>Layer was downloaded as a shapefile by ITOS from a Dropbox link provided by the IMO. It was then analyzed by ITOS for errors. Those errors were corrected and the layer was sent back to UNOCHA as a feature class within a file geodatabase. The following errors were found and fixed by ITOS: 1. Projection changed to "GCS_WGS_1984" 2. Created and populated Admin0 name and p-code fields 3. Admin2 name "Ijebu ode" was converted to proper case. 4. Created and populated reference name field 5. Fixed 28 gap errors and 30 overlap errors 6. Fixed nesting errors with Admin0 and 1 7. As instructed by IMO, Admin2 "Kaga" was split and Admin2 "Gujba" was created 8. Admin2 "Damboa" was changed from a small sliver to a fully formed unit by dissolving the Admin3 units attributed to it. 9. As instructed by IMO, ITOS switched names and p-codes of the following Admin2 units: Girei and Gombi, Yola North and Yola South, Njikoka and Dunukofia </history>
